title: Fail to import a definition file containing new Tab AccessTypeRoles with CaseAssignedRoleField is null in AccessTypeRoles
specs: contains a definition file with new tab AccessTypeRoles with CaseAssignedRoleField is null when GroupRoleName is not null

body.__plainTextValue__: Validation errors occurred importing the spreadsheet.- 'CaseAssignedRoleField' must be set if 'GroupRoleName' is not null in the sheet 'AccessTypeRoles'
